usedelements: Physical Damage, Life Drain, Earth Damage
name: Deathbringer
strategy:
To all vocations: stay diagonal and watch out when doing attacks like [[Exori]] or [[Ethereal Spear]] as you may get exhausted and unable to heal so make sure your hit points is full before using those attacks.
[[Druid]] and [[Sorcerer]]: Use [[Magic Shield]] and try to shoot [[Heavy Magic Missile]] runes or [[Energy Strike]]s since it's weak against that element, [[Energy Beam]] deals great damage but it's dangerous as you stand on the way and vulnerable to waves. Bringing some [[Stone Skin Amulet]]s might be handy. Using an [[Energy Wall]] and run over it to make Deathbringer run around is a good strategy (also works for paladins). But be careful: '''Deathbringer takes a lot of time to kill for mages and don't let your mana low.'''
[[Knight]]: Melee and use [[Whirlwind Throw]] (makes you waste more potions) or [[Fierce Berserk]].
[[Paladin]]: Shoot [[Assassin Stars]] and [[Divine Missile]].
